constituent: comrade, un-, jail cell, prison bars, car
koohiiStory1: Some man jailed in Russia, is freed by his comrade (from the Communist party perhaps), who crashes into the jail cell with a vehicle.
koohiiStory2: (+fuaburisu) But it´s the wrong jail cell! Your comrade is one floor above.
kunYomi: ともがら、 -ばら、 やかい、 やから
